alfredsnippet.snippet:
Fred Hoyle, The Universe: Past And Present Reflections, Ann. Rev. Astron. Astrophys. 1982. 20, p.16

"Like entropy, which perpetually increases, educational standards perpetually worsen. And like entropy, which increases inevitably because of the policies of physics, education worsens inevitably because of the policies of educators. Instead of teaching being properly confined to the rote-learning of facts and well-proven techniques, pupils are confused nowadays by the teaching of meanings that they cannot comprehend."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Hoyle on the Worsening of Education
